title: Viral Map Creation and Diffusion Strategies: Case Analysis and Machine Learning Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental cartography concepts and social media application experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing Capabilities in Creating and Analyzing Viral Maps Linked to Language Domains for Current Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze viral map cases on social media and explain their diffusion mechanisms.
Learners can assess the impact of map design elements (colors, layout, etc.) on virality.
Learners can extract map design patterns using machine learning-based image analysis tools
Learners can develop effective viral map creation strategies based on real-world case studies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
